meanings.definition: A person who operates a keypunch machine to punch holes in cards for data processing.
meanings.sent1: The keypunchers at the office are skilled at using the machine.
meanings.sent2: The keypunchers worked diligently to punch holes in the data cards.
meanings.sent3: The keypunchers had a race to see who could punch the most holes in a minute!
meanings.sent4: In the world of data processing, keypunchers are the unsung heroes.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the keypunchers rhythmically punching holes filled the room.

meanings.definition: The act of punching holes in cards using a keypunch machine.
meanings.sent1: The keypunchers' job involves precise hole punching on data cards.
meanings.sent2: Keypunchers must be careful to avoid errors while punching holes.
meanings.sent3: The keypunchers organized a competition to see who could punch the most holes accurately.
meanings.sent4: The keypunchers' work is like creating a secret code on the cards.
meanings.sent5: The keypunchers' role is crucial in the data processing workflow.
